message.body: Hey sofie this is Phil. I'm on my way up to Boston now. Once I get off the green line, do you wanna give me an address to meet you at?
Lets meet at Peets coffee at massart 620 Huntington Ave
Sounds good. I'm wearing bright blue pants, can't miss me :)
Thank you so much for meeting with me sofie, it was so informative and inspiring! I'll definitely be in touch, and for sure put me on the newsletter :-)
